bill.title: Emergency communications districts; require regular audits, etc.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 7-7-211, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Require The State Auditor To Ensure That When Conducting County Audits, That The Funds And Transactions Of Emergency Communications Districts Be Included In Such Audit; To Require That Emergency Communications Districts, Which Maintain Their Funds In A Fund Or Funds Separate From The County General Fund, Employ The Services Of A Certified Public Accountant To Conduct An Audit Of The Emergency Communications District; To Amend Section 19-5-307, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Establish The Purposes For Which Emergency Communications Districts May Purchase And Procure Equipment, Commodities And Services, And Empower The Commercial Mobile Radio Services Board To Establish Regulations Governing Such Purposes; To Amend Section 19-5-333, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Empower The Commercial Mobile Radio Services Board To Carry Out Certain Additional Functions; And For Related Purposes.
